subject: [Radiance-general]OSX ra_tiff "-spec" option
body:
Hello,
I've noticed that the "-spec" option for ra_tiff is not supported in the
OSX binaries.  As I've been having problems compiling the head to get
the newest version of "ra_tiff," I was hoping someone might be able to
email me the program file?  Thanks!
email:  chris at coolshadow dot calm

~Chris H
